forbiddenPage.title: Permission Denied

blockedBanner.text:
This server has been blocked for violating our Terms of Service or Acceptable Use Policy.
Reason given: {{reason}}
If you think this is a mistake, please contact our support team.

deleteButton.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
